4.eng-name: The Book On The Mosques And The Congregations

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir bin 'Abdullah that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever builds a mosque for the sake of Allah, like a sparrow's nest for Allah or even smaller, Allah will build for him a house in Paradise

chapter.eng-name: One Who Builds A Mosque For The Sake Of Allah
